problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,点D、E分别在AB、AC边上,DE∥BC．若\frac{AE}{AC}=\frac{3}{4},AD=9,则AB等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, points D and E are on edges AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC. If \frac{AE}{AC}=\frac{N_0}{N_1},AD=N_2, then AB is equal to ()
raw_comment: 本题考查平行线分线段成比例定理,灵活运用定理、找准对应关系是解题的关键．
